name: Bubble Trick
description:
Bubble Trick is a cute and colourful match 3 bubble shooting game. Pop colourful bubbles by shooting and matching at least 3 bubbles. 50+ well designed Halloween themed levels will keep you and your family hooked.

How to play

Tap and hold where you want the bubble to go to see it’s projection and plan before you take your shot. Release to make the shot.

FEATURES
- Colourful bubbles
- 50+ fun levels
- Haloween themed design
